name: Void of Desire
description:
Immerse yourself in a story where a being from another world asks for your help. Your help to quench her thirst for revenge and blood. Will you manage to avoid the tragic fate of being consumed by the void, or will you be consumed by desire instead?

◈Visual novel with good and bad endings. (+5)

◈Gallery of unlockable illustrations.

◈Unlockable alternate chapter and epilogue.

◈Languages: Spanish and English.

◈ Soundtrack also added.
